name: ReleaseDate(forMovies)
0:
”Alexa, ask release date of Thor Ragnarok.”
”Ask the release date of the new thor.”
”Ask release date, when will Infinity War release?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: release date
des: Get release date of any movie. The movie can be in any language but the name has to be English. Smart recognition of movie names!
